amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for an exhibition or parade of military forces and hardware, except for the display of small arms and munitions appropriate for customary ceremonial honors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to prohibit the use of funds for an exhibition or parade of military forces and hardware, except for the display of small arms and munitions appropriate for customary ceremonial honors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 207 (Roll no. 458).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Raskin amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 207 (Roll no. 458).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Raskin.
